duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitoring a New York State Workers’ Compensation caseload and preparing cases for hearings and trials
Reviewing expert and medical reports and developing direct and cross-examination questions
Conducting depositions and attending hearings, arbitrations, court conferences, drafting arguments and motions
Negotiating settlements of pending cases and overseeing outside counsel

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor Degree from an accredited law school and New York State Bar Admission and license to practice law
